title: book_Last_Train_to_Paradise
text:
ISBN-13: 9781400049479.
ISBN-10: 1400049474.
Title: Last Train to Paradise.
Subtitle: Henry Flagler and the Spectacular Rise and Fall of the Railroad That Crossed an Ocean.
Authors: Les Standiford.
Categories: History.
Thumbnail: http://books.google.com/books/content?id=S0uJUvlgHywC&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&source=gbs_api.
Description: Describes the remarkable and challenging efforts of ambitious entrepreneur Henry Flagler to construct a railway that would connect Key West to the mainland, following the design and engineering of the project, the thousands of workers who brought Flagler's vision to life, and the 1935 hurricane that destroyed the railway. Reprint. 75,000 first printing..
Published Year: 2003.
Average Rating: 4.02.
Number of Pages: 288.
Ratings Count: 1644.
